package svc

import (
    "context"

    "encore.dev/pubsub"
)

type MyMessage struct {}

//encore:api
func SomeAPI(ctx context.Context) error {
    topic := pubsub.NewTopic[MyMessage]("basic-topic")
    topic.Publish(ctx, &MyMessage{})
}
